channel.title: Rune Isle
channel.description:
I am in the process of making a new server :rolleyes:
I have been working on it for a couple of hours a day, every day, for the last few days. So far it has actually kept my interest (usually that is why I quit working on servers).
The main reason I am posting this thread is because I need a client developer. Preferably one who is decent with graphics/interfaces to make me a professional looking client out of the one that I am currently using.
So post here if you would like to develop a client for my server (yes you will get admin and all of that good stuff when the server is released).
I am not going to post pictures of the server yet because of how shit the client is :P

item.title: Rune Isle
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

I am bored… I can be your beta tester etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Isle
item.dc:creator: @barmantom barmantom
item.description:
@barmantom wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:10, topic:333316”][quote author=barmantom link=topic=429724.msg3162233#msg3162233 date=1269681730]
Check out my Sexiest client post if you would like some help,
Thats what I got so far so like,
You want me to help,
Ive just added 100% GS stances

[/quote]
Check out what you really did if you observed your Sexiest client,
Thats what every Fubergen client has,
How can you help,
Youve just removed stuff from it[/quote]
Thats not all I can do, and just cuz im 11

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Isle
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:7, topic:333316”][quote author=Newty link=topic=429724.msg3155839#msg3155839 date=1269035786]
Still looking for a client developer.

PM me or post for more information. I can let you on the server to check it out, etc.
[/quote]
Me <3

EDIT: Actually, why not refer to tutorials?[/quote]

I could do that, and have been doing that, but I can’t stand working on both the client and the server. I would rather just manage the server content and let somebody else worry about the client.

Read full topic
